text: I'll need some more information in order to help. Where is the JSON coming from and how are you storing it now?
Hello! Does anyone have experience integrating Yotpo Q&As to HubSpot? Trying to figure out if there is any way this can be done.
Must be in prod, I guess
<@U05EJLL49KQ> Yah I found it in prod, little buried in the custom association labels, but its there. Thanks for reply!

Hello good afternoon. Here at the company we work with "Respondi", a tool where we capture leads similar to Typeform and Google Form. Then the customer answers some questions and we capture these leads. Previously, through Webhook, we connected to Zapier, our old CRM tool, the idea would be to connect Respondi with HubSpot through Webhook. So that people fill out our form and their leads come to HubSpot

I'm struggling to find information on creating dynamic pages that call external APIs. Everything I've found  is about connecting to CRM data or HubDBs, but I just need something like /product/1205423 and my module will fetch external data based on the URL. Can someone point me to resources for this?

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!
Do I build my app in the 404 page and conditionally render content based on URL?
I guess you can add a "#" after a URL and do like /product/#/12325235 and which shows /product
Using a hash like this will not be indexed crawled separately. Surely there is a solution to this in HubSpot.
Which external apis are you trying to use?
